title: Here is a curated list of 20 articles on the security, privacy, and copyright aspects of large language models (LLMs) up to 2024. These articles cover a range of topics including data privacy, model security, ethical considerations, and intellectual property issues related to LLMs
**"Privacy-Preserving Machine Learning: Threats and Solutions"**
**"Adversarial Attacks on Language Models: A Survey"**
**"Data Poisoning Attacks Against Large Language Models"**
container-title: IEEE Transactions on Neural Networks and Learning Systems
**"Differential Privacy in Natural Language Processing"** - Proceedings of the 2022 Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing (EMNLP

title: **"Legal and Ethical Implications of AI-Generated Text"**
**"Copyright Challenges in the Age of AI: The Case of Large Language Models"**
**"Mitigating Bias and Ensuring Fairness in Large Language Models"**
**"Secure Model Inference in NLP: Techniques and Applications"**
**"Privacy Risks in Language Models: An Empirical Study"**
container-title: Proceedings of the 2023 International Conference on Learning Representations (ICLR

title: **"Ethical Considerations for Deploying Large Language Models in Real-World Applications"**
**"The Role of Explainability in the Security of Large Language Models"**
**"Intellectual Property and AI: Protecting Innovations in the Era of Large Language Models"**
**"Privacy-Preserving Techniques for Training Large Language Models"**
container-title: Proceedings of the 2022 Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS) Conference

title: **"AI and Copyright: Navigating the Legal Landscape of AI-Generated Content"**
publisher: Columbia Science and Technology Law Review

title: **"Securing Large Language Models Against Adversarial Threats"**
Balancing Innovation and Responsibility in Language Models"**

Policy Recommendations for Large Language Models"**

These articles should provide a comprehensive overview of the current and emerging issues related to the security, privacy, and copyright of large language models
